augmentation module¶

class augmentation.Augmenter(PARAMS, img_paths, ann_paths, out_dir=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class load image sets at different exposures and their annotations to generate augmented images from them.

static gaussian_blur(img_instance, gauss_config)[source]¶

Apply Gaussian filter to an image instance

Parameters

  • img_instance (numpy.array) – Input image array

  • gauss_config (dict) – Filter parameters

Returns

Blurred image output

Return type

numpy.array

generate_aug(num_gen, r_state=1, write_img=False, start_index=0)[source]¶

To generate augmented image and annotation sets. Same augmentation is applied to a set of images and its annotation.

Parameters

  • num_gen (int) – Number of images to be generated.

  • r_state (int, optional) – Random state to select image set.

  • to 1. (Defaults) –

  • write_img (bool, optional) – Flag to write images to output folder.

  • to False. (Defaults) –

Returns

Augmented annotation set of (out_h, out_w, num_exp*3) numpy.array: Augmented annotation set of (out_h, out_w, 1)

Return type

numpy.array

static get_augmenters(num_gen, aug_config)[source]¶
